DOCNAME: CASE OF KHVOROSTINA AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are NORP nationals who live in the town of GPE in LOC . They are former employees of ORG of ORG ( hereafter DATE the ORG ) . The CARDINAL applicants were employed as engineers , CARDINAL as a technician and CARDINAL as a land engineer .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicants were dismissed from their positions .
CARDINAL . The applicants sued the ORG for reinstatement and wage arrears for the period from DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicants ' claims for reinstatement but awarded them the amounts listed in the schedule . The judgment became final on DATE when ORG upheld it on appeal . The judgment remains unenforced because the ORG does not have necessary funds .
CARDINAL . The applicants asked the Justice of ORG to award them wage arrears for the period from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Justice of the ORG accepted their action against the ORG and awarded them the amounts listed in the schedule . The judgment was not appealed against and became final .
CARDINAL . Enforcement proceedings were instituted , but the judgment was not enforced because the ORG did not have funds .
CARDINAL . On DATE the sums awarded by the judgment of DATE were credited to the applicants ' accounts .

CARDINAL . The applicants lodged an action against the ORG , complaining that the ORG failed to enforce the judgments of DATE and DATE . They sought payment of the amounts awarded under those judgments .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Justice of the Peace held that the ORG should pay the applicants compensation for the delay in enforcement of the judgment of DATE for the period from CARDINAL DATE to DATE ( the amounts awarded are listed in the schedule ) . The judgment of DATE was upheld on appeal on DATE .
CARDINAL . Enforcement proceedings were instituted but the judgment of DATE , as upheld on appeal on DATE , remains unenforced because the ORG does not have funds .
